mapper.select:
select a.id userCode, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_name userName, a.role role, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.email email, a.id_card idCard, a.user_password userPassword, a.image_path imagePath, a.version version from tb_user a where a.is_deleted = 1
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.role = #{role}
order by create_time desc
